title: Nereus Secret Depths
description: A fast moving believable adult sci-fi story. Nereus is the US Forces secret weapon who becomes romantically involved with Tia, who is a beautiful celebrity model and Heiress. Nereus is torn between his feelings for her and his loyalty to his President.This is a pocket sized paperback book.Also available as an Amazon ebook.See website www.nereusgreatwhite.com.
author: K.L. Hemmings
